info.name: Campfire Store API
info.description:
Campfire Store APIÂ is a demo project of an API for an online store.

The API provides access to the store products, category system and simple user management, allows you to add products to the cart and place orders.

It provides access to the shop's products, category system and simple user management, allows you to add products to the cart and place orders.

Protected resources require prior authorization.

request.description: Create a new user account.
Log in to an existing user account.
Log out from the current user account.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported query conditions: $gt, $gte, $lt, $lte, $in, $or, $regex, etc. Supported value types: string, number, boolean, object, array.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.

request.description:
Get list of cart entries for a user's cart. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.
ID of an entry to search for.

request.description:
Get an existing entry of a user's cart by provided user's ID or email, cart ID and entry ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to create a cart entry for.
ID of a cart to search for.

request.description:
Create a new entry for a user's cart.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.
ID of an entry to search for.

request.description:
Update an existing entry of a user's cart by provided user's ID or email, cart ID and entry ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.
ID of an entry to search for.

request.description:
Delete an existing entry of a user's cart by provided user's ID or email, cart ID and entry ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.

request.description:
Get list of user's carts.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.

request.description:
Get an existing cart of a user by provided user's ID or email and cart ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to create a cart for.

request.description:
Create a new cart for a user.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.

request.description:
Update an existing cart of a user by provided user's ID or email and cart ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a cart to search for.

request.description:
Delete an existing cart of a user by provided user's ID or email and cart ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
Comma separated set of returned fields.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported query conditions: $gt, $gte, $lt, $lte, $in, $or, $regex, etc. Supported value types: string, number, boolean, object, array.

request.description: Get list of categories. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

variable.description: ID of a category to search for.

request.description: Get an existing category by provided ID.

Create a new category.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID of a category to search for.

request.description:
Update an existing category by provided ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID of a category to search for.

request.description:
Delete an existing category by provided ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

query.description: Comma separated set of returned fields.

request.description: Get list of currencies.

query.description: Comma separated set of returned fields.

request.description: Get list of languages.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported query conditions: $gt, $gte, $lt, $lte, $in, $or, $regex, etc. Supported value types: string, number, boolean, object, array.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.

request.description:
Get list of user's orders. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of an order to search for.

request.description:
Get an existing order of a user by provided user's ID or email and order ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to place an order for.

request.description:
Place an order from a cart.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported query conditions: $gt, $gte, $lt, $lte, $in, $or, $regex, etc. Supported value types: string, number, boolean, object, array.

request.description: Get list of products. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported value types are [string, number, boolean].

variable.description: ID of a leaf category or a root category to filter by. For root categories, the result will contain list of products for all it's child (leaf) categories.

request.description: Get list of products. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

variable.description: ID of a product to search for.

request.description: Get an existing product by provided ID.

Create a new product.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID of a product to search for.

request.description:
Update an existing product by provided ID. Alternatively, this endpoint can be used to upload product images. Allowed image format is .webp. Recommended minimum image size is 2000x2000.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID of a product to search for.

request.description:
Delete an existing product by provided ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID of a product to search for.
ID of an image to search for.

request.description:
Delete a product image by providedproduct ID and image ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
Comma separated set of returned fields.

request.description: Get list of titles. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

variable.description: ID of a title to search for.

request.description: Get an existing title by provided ID.

Create a new title.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

Update an existing title by provided ID.

query.description: Maximal number of results per page. Default is 25, maximal is 50.
JSON string with parameter names and values to filter by. Supported query conditions: $gt, $gte, $lt, $lte, $in, $or, $regex, etc. Supported value types: string, number, boolean, object, array.

request.description:
Get list of users. The results can be filtered, sorted, paginated and limited using special query parameters.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.

request.description:
Get an existing user by provided ID or email.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role. Users without admin role can only update themselves.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.

request.description:
Update an existing user by provided ID or email. Alternatively, this endpoint can be used to upload/replace user's photo. Allowed image formats are .jpeg, .png and .webp. Recommended minimum image size is 500x500.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role. Users without this role can only update themselves.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.

request.description:
Delete an existing user by provided ID or email.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role.

variable.description: ID or email of a user to search for.
ID of a photo to search for.

request.description:
Delete a user's photo by provided user's ID or email and photo ID.

This resource is protected and requires prior authorization.

This resource is restricted to users without an admin role. Users without this role can only remove photos of themselves.
